content: Xuming He Xuming He Home About Research Project Publication Student Teaching Course@SIST Reading Group Links PLUS@ShanghaiTech CECS@ANU Xuming He Associate Professor PLUS Lab School of Information Science and Technology (SIST) ShanghaiTech University Address Room 1A-221, SIST Building 393 Middle Huaxia Road Pudong, Shanghai, 201210, China Contact Phone: +86 21 20685378 Email: hexm at shanghaitech dot edu dot cn News [08/2023] One paper on interactive segmentation accepted in BMVC 2023. [08/2023] One paper on long-tailed NCD accepted in TMLR. [07/2023] One paper on 3D object detection accepted in ACM MM 2023. [07/2023] Two papers on relational reasoning/novel class discovery accepted in ICCV 2023. [06/2023] Congratulations to Qian He for successfully completing her Phd Degree. [06/2023] Congratulations to Chuanyang Hu for successfully completing Master's Degree. [04/2023] One paper accepted in IJCAI 2023. [03/2023] One paper accepted in CVPR 2023. [01/2023] Two papers accepted in ICLR 2023.
